h4.a: Open Enrollment/ School Of Choice Request 2019-20

aside.p: The priority at Bellaire Public Schools has always been to provide a quality education for our students. One component that truly aids in that goal is having a low student-to-teacher ratio as we believe that class size is a critical part of our children’s education. Therefore, during the 2019-20 school year, Bellaire Public Schools will not be participating in the school-of-choice program and will not be accepting any new open enrollment students.
